vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for an industrial (outside) potentially incompatible use limited to asphalt and concrete crushing on property zoned an IM Industrial Manufacturing District, on the east line of Luna Road; between Y Street and Ryan Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions  
Z223-286(MP)
